instruments.name: Electric Guitar
instruments.description: The electric guitar is a versatile instrument used in various genres of music. It is played by plucking or strumming the strings and producing sound through an amplifier.

instruments.name: Drums
instruments.description: Drums are a rhythmic instrument consisting of various components, such as the bass drum, snare drum, and cymbals. They are played by striking or hitting the different drum surfaces.

instruments.name: Piano
instruments.description: The piano is a versatile keyboard instrument with a wide range of notes. It is played by pressing the keys, which cause hammers to strike the strings and produce sound.

instruments.name: Bass Guitar
instruments.description: The bass guitar is a lower-pitched instrument that provides the foundation of the rhythm section in many music genres. It is played by plucking or strumming the strings.

instruments.name: Trumpet
instruments.description: The trumpet is a brass instrument known for its bright and powerful sound. It is played by buzzing the lips into a cup-shaped mouthpiece and pressing the valves to change the pitch.

instruments.name: Violin
instruments.description: The violin is a string instrument played with a bow. It has a rich and expressive sound and is a prominent member of the orchestral and chamber music ensembles.
